title: CBSL annual report presented to Finance Minister
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The seventy second Annual Report of the Monetary Board of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka was presented to the Finance Minister Ali Sabry, by Dr. P Nandalal Weerasinghe, the Governor of the Central Bank of Sri Lanka yesterday (29).
Alternatives ready if tanker owners go on strike: Minister Kanchana
